mapper.insert: insert into score (id, user_id, score_change, change_value, surplus_score, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scoreChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{surplusScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update score set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, score_change = #{scoreChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_value = #{changeValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, surplus_score = #{surplusScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, score_change, change_value, surplus_score, create_time, update_time from score
